name: Football Fan Fanatics
description:
How to play:

With the left mouse button, you can hold and drag to select units, when units are selected you can click on another part of the map to move them, they aren't the most organised so they don't always listen and will sometimes attack other people.

Whilst selected you can target a building that does not belong to you to try and take it over by sending units inside. Alternatively, you can move them around the map this way or send them to your own base, making them enter and upgrade your unit production.

With the right mouse button, you can hold and drag to move the map.

With the scroll wheel, you can zoom in and out.
